resources.string: Last Seen Episode Name and Air Date
Rick and Morty is an adult animated television series created for Adult Swim by Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon.
The series chronicles the adventures of alcoholic scientist Rick and his grandson Morty, who divide their time between family life and interdimensional travel.
You can find all the characters in the application. Let\'s take a look at our app
